abstract: National Archives and Records Administration releases 1959 list of potential atomic bomb targets in Soviet Union, Eastern Europe and China; list shows industrial facilities and government buildings as targets as well as urban populations.
lead_paragraph: A list of the United States’ potential targets in the event of war with the Soviet Union shows that while many were industrial facilities and government buildings, one for each city was simply designated “Population.”

headline.main: 1950s U.S. Nuclear Target List Offers Chilling Insight
headline.print_headline: ’50s Nuclear Target List Offers Chilling Insight
